title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: 2012 Casascius 10BTC silver 1oz coin REDEEMEDLOT 2: 2012 Casascius 10BTC silver/gilt 1oz coin REDEEMEDSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0000MINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: SEPTEMBER 16th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: MJ....I noticed there are no holo or private keys....do they come with that or are they missing? Thanks

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: BTCOVERFIATS on September 11, 2023, 01:20:37 PMLot 1: 0.05BTCLot 2: 0.05BTCCurrent high bidsQuote from: krogothmanhattan on September 11, 2023, 04:03:33 PMMJ....I noticed there are no holo or private keys....do they come with that or are they missing? ThanksCoins come as seen. There are no associated keys or holograms

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: That all silver 10 BTC Casascius coin is one of my all time favorites. A great collectible for sure. I’m tempted to bid on it so that I can have one I actually see. It’s been so long since I’ve seen mine in storage, at some point it’s like I don’t even really own it. These would be baller pieces to carry around with you in your pocket and you’d get to see them!
